entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Drumheller
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:06 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Drumheller 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -15.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -18.9°C
Wind: SSE 18 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:06 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:06 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:06 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
